Adam algorithm.from sentence: In the experiments , our model was trained using the Adam algorithm with a learning rate initialized at 0.001 .

dimension.from sentence: The dimension of the hidden layers of bi - LSTM is 100 .

Word embeddings.from sentence: Word embeddings are initialized from GloVe 100 dimensional pre-trained embeddings .

POS and dependency embeddings.from sentence: POS and dependency embeddings are randomly initialized with 40 - dimensional vectors .

embeddings.from sentence: The embeddings are all updated during training .

Dropping probability.from sentence: Dropping probability for dropout layers between stacked LSTM layers is 0.5 .

batch size.from sentence: The batch size is set as 30 .

utilize.from sentence: We utilize an open source ILP solver 4 in our method .
